summary: adds fused Fire and Frost spells, with few minor issues.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 4 new destruction spells to the game, with minor issues due to my lack of knowledge, but not too serious issues.

Learn to wield not only Fire or Frost separately, but fused together into ultimate spells of hot and cold

The Novice Destruction spells "Flames" and "Frostbite" have been fused into "Fire Frost Stream"
The Apprentice Destruction spells "Firebolt" and "Ice Spike" have been fused into "Fire Frost Shot"
The Adept Destruction spells "Fire Ball" and "Ice Storm" have been fused into "Fire Frost Blast"
The Expert Destruction spells "Incinerate" and "Icy Spear" have been fused into "Advanced Fire Frost Shot"

WARNING: People have stated that no vendors sell the spell tomes. Also, due to CK being difficult to deal with, I am unable to place a world spawn. IF you want to acquire these spells, you will have to use the Console.

Minor Issues mentioned:
-Damage Balancing Issues are encountered, as each spell uses damage from both the spells.
-Textures look like either the frost spell or fire spell (not both), but still display frost and burning on enemy. The inventory image has been fixed to the absorb appearance.

Hopefully, eventually, damages from both spells will be balanced and custom spell textures will be added. And maybe I will get smarter :D
If anyone has knowledge that can help me improve, leave a post for me and i'll reply when I can.

Enjoy~
author: lumi135
